entry.title: Rose Lace Satin 3031 Sage
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 19.95

These Satin Silk robes are of amazing quality. You know when you walk past that upscale lingerie boutique and you see these hanging in the window for $85+? Well, this is them, perfect for wedding parties or a special night in! This satin is such a fine, high quality that you would swear it was pure silk. 

Measurements are 1/2 measurements this means that they are taken with the robe lying flat on a tabletop. The bust measurement is taken from one underarm seam to the other when lying flat. Double the bust for full measurement around. Sizes are approx and must allow for a small margin of error.

Regular Size - Bust 65cm, Length 92.5cm (including lace)

Plus Size - Bust 71cm, Length 101cm (including lace)

Size 4 - Bust 35cm, Length 56.5cm (including lace)
Size 8 - Bust 41.5cm, Length 72.5cm (including lace)
Size 12 - Bust  50cm, Length 84.5cm (including lace)

Made in China by a manufacturer that specializes in fine lingerie and caters to the Canadian, Australia, UK, Ireland, and European markets.
